name: Angry Warrior: Eternity Slasher 3D Fantasy Battle With Orcs
name_original: Angry Warrior: Eternity Slasher 3D Fantasy Battle With Orcs
description:
Awaken the Angry Warrior within you! Smash the orcs! Bring some heat to the arrogant trolls!

Download the game now and enjoy!

- Save the peaceful peasants from the evil onslaught!
- Obtain new shields and swords to become ever stronger!
- Use super-skills to emerge victorious even from the most dire battle!


***** Important: *****
- Free crystals!
- Cool graphics and music!
- Superb special effects!


***** Players' opinion: *****
Ars (London): Love the music and love pounding the orcs! The guys did a great job!

Ramil (Moscow): Nice visuals! There should be more games like that!
